Text:
Thanks for the books. But, you can save yourself some work, and bandwidth, as AZW, PRC and MOBI are all the exact same format. I suggest you just stick with MOBI as the best identifier.

Thanks again for the Tom Sharpe
Thanks so much..more please.. I am greedy..lol
Thanks alot for these. Theres also some audio books Ive downloaded from Demonoid.
